Makufoods company corporate website

Opencart website

Visit website

About this project

Project developed as a contructor with the Smart Gyrus web agency. It is an online shop built with Opencart CMS with its own built theme.

At this project I worked as a Full-Stack Developer. I was responsible for building markup form scratch, applying it to Opencart, modifying Opencart modules and adding different JavaScript functionality such as jQuery plugins.

After it was build I have been continuing to maintain website by creating different landing pages and editing current ones.

Used technologies

  • PHP, Opencart CMS
  • JavaScript, jQuery
  • HTML5 semantic
  • CSS3 + LESS, PostCSS
